Sidebar - Class in de.mrapp.android.sidebar
A custom view, which allows to show a sidebar, which overlaps the view's main content and can be shown or hidden in an animated manner.
Sidebar(Context) - Constructor for class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
Creates a new custom view, which allows to show a sidebar, which overlaps the view's main content and can be shown or hidden in an animated manner.
Sidebar(Context, AttributeSet) - Constructor for class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
Creates a new custom view, which allows to show a sidebar, which overlaps the view's main content and can be shown or hidden in an animated manner.
Sidebar(Context, AttributeSet, int) - Constructor for class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
Creates a new custom view, which allows to show a sidebar, which overlaps the view's main content and can be shown or hidden in an animated manner.
SidebarListener - Interface in de.mrapp.android.sidebar
Defines the interface, a class, which should be notified when a sidebar becomes shown or hidden, must implement.
SidebarSavedState - Class in de.mrapp.android.sidebar.savedstate
A data structure, which allows to save the internal state of a Sidebar.

Creates a new data structure, which allows to store the internal state of a Sidebar.

Creates a new data structure, which allows to store the internal state of a Sidebar.
SidebarView - Class in de.mrapp.android.sidebar.view
A custom view, which contains the sidebar view of a sidebar, as well as a view, which is used to visualize a shadow.
SidebarView(Context, Inflater, Location, Drawable, int, int) - Constructor for class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.view.SidebarView
Creates a new custom view, which contains the sidebar view of a sidebar, as well as a view, which is used to visualize a shadow.
SidebarViewAnimation - Class in de.mrapp.android.sidebar.animation
An animation, which allows to move a sidebar's sidebar view, when the sidebar should be shown or hidden.
SidebarViewAnimation(float, long, AnimationListener) - Constructor for class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.animation.SidebarViewAnimation
Creates a new animation, which allows to move a sidebar's sidebar view, when the sidebar should be shown or hidden.
